title: Annoying issues with capsules and server
body:
Okay it's really starting to get on my nerves and I'm hoping to get an answer for this.

In a lot of my game, at complete random, I'll just suddenly be unable to move or do anything. My ping will be fine, hovering around the usual 20-30ms, and everything else in the game around me will be going fine, but for some reason everything I do is stuck and I can't do anything; no typing, no moving, no smiting or flashing, my game basically just freezes for me while everybody else around me does their thing. It's particularly frustrating when it happens mid-fight, and I know it's not my connection because my browser's still working fine, so wtf is happening over on the server side?

Apart from that, I just hit level 40 and was "awarded" a glorious champion capsule, except upon loading up my loot inventory, it's not there. What's up with that?
